import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../responsive-navbar.css'; // ✅ Make sure this path is correct function Navbar() { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); return (
setMenuOpen(false)}>Home setMenuOpen(false)}>Personal setMenuOpen(false)}>Education setMenuOpen(false)}>Experience setMenuOpen(false)}>Skills setMenuOpen(false)}>Projects
); } export default Navbar;
